text: John Leckie Hannigan (born 17 February 1933) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:People from Barrhead Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Maryhill Harp F.C. players Category:Greenock Morton F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Weymouth F.C. players Category:Bath City F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Sportspeople from East Renfrewshire
title: Johnny Hannigan
